title: Viv (Graham) Simply The Best
description: On New Years Eve 1993, Viv Graham's life came to a violent end. This book recounts his life and his involvement with the Geordie Mafia. It presents an insight into Tyneside and Teeside's criminal underworld, as well as detailing kneecappings, shootings, drug dealing, protection rackets, and more.
author: Stephen Richards
